document_data.name: Hall of Commanders
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hall of Commanders''' was part of the complex of the [[Palace of the Enlightened Throne]] in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: The Hall of Commanders was a large area dedicated to the housing of various leaders of the [[mamluk]]s, guards, and admirality. Each apartment was complimented by a host of servants.
document_data.Inhabitants: Notable inhabitants of the Hall of Commanders included [[Thokkor]], [[Preani Qin]], and [[Sedji al-Sanje]].
